intro: Psychotria haitiensis, commonly known as Haitian Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant native to the Caribbean, particularly Haiti. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its dark green, glossy leaves and small, white to pale yellow flowers. It typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as tropical forests. Psychotria haitiensis is also noted for its potential ethnobotanical uses, though further research is needed to fully understand its properties.
